---
title: "AnnotationInfo"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Annotation info annotating a class id or key-point id.

Color and label will be used to annotate entities/keypoints which reference the id.
The id refers either to a class or key-point id

## Fields
* `id`: `uint16`
* `label`: nullable [`Utf8`](../datatypes/utf8.md)
* `color`: nullable [`Rgba32`](../datatypes/rgba32.md)

## Arrow datatype
```
Struct {
    id: uint16
    label: nullable utf8
    color: nullable uint32
}
```
